article.title: Indexing Languages and Thesauri: Construction and Maintenance
article.author: Soergel, D.
article.text: This book has two objectives. First, to reassess thoroughly the functions of an indexing language or thesaurus in a information storage and retrieval system and in the light of this reassessment to analyze the structure of indexing languages and thesauri. Most importantly, this reassessment is based on a unified view of indexing languages (classification schemes) and thesauri as information storage and retrieval systems on the other. It results in general principles that are applicable to a wide range of situations.
